name: Catch_a_phantom
description:
"Catch_a_phantom" is a game created in GAME MARKER 2 engine. Game was created for Chronicles GameDev Challenge, Week 4. 
Your goal in this game is catching a ghost who haunts abandoned resident. if you want to catch a ghost you need ghost catcher which you buy for money. how to earn money? 
Just record paranormal activity by micros,cameras,detectors and scaners. Goodluck! Oh and remember... in the night ghost getting agressive.

W,S,A,D - movement
E - interactions(for example using holy water on lamps)
T - wait 1 minute
Z - micro
X - camera
C - decoy
V - detector
B - scaner
